mapper.insert: INSERT INTO property_table(apply_user_name, company_id, branch_id, service_date, contact_info, concrete_time, service_location, reception_service, order_maintain, dining_service, enviroment_maintain, engineering_manage, firefighting_manage, addition, apply_time) VALUES (#{applyUserName},#{companyId},#{branchId},#{serviceDate},#{contactInfo},#{concreteTime},#{serviceLocation},#{receptionService},#{olderMantain},#{diningService},#{enviromentMaintain},#{engineeringManage},#{firefightingManage},#{addition},#{applyTime})
